title: Blazor
subtext: .NET frontend web framework based on HTML, CSS, and C#
author: patrickpiedad

description.title: Blazor
texts: Blazor is a .NET frontend web framework based on HTML, CSS, and C#. This framework allows the user to share server-side and client-side app logic. It is part of the .NET environment and can utilize all .NET libraries.
Blazor is offered in many forms, to include BlazorWebApp (newest version), Standalone WebAssembly, and Blazor Hybrid / .NET MAUI (allows for native application creation)
